excerpt.rendered:
ESC 2017/ESB-5235/04
Cask Type: European Oak Sherry Butt
Distilled: 30 March 2005
Bottled: 28 August 2017
One of 561 bottles

Nose: Vanilla pods rounded with summer fruit berries. Sweet toasted oak
Taste: Toffee sweet with a background of sweet cinnamon.
Finish: Sweet

Bottle size : 700
Distillery : Macallan
Age : 12
Vintage : 2005
ABV : 63.80%
